name: Blackthorne's Surcoat
flavorText: Baron Blackthorne led his knights to prevent the escape of King Leoric's forces during their defeat against Westmarch, forcing them to choose between surrender and death in the quagmire.
flavorTextHtml: Baron Blackthorne led his knights to prevent the escape of King Leoric's forces during their defeat against Westmarch, forcing them to choose between surrender and death in the quagmire.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 +250 Vitality    
 Increases damage against elites by 10.0%(3) Set:     
 Reduces damage from elites by 10.0%    
 +25% Extra Gold from Monsters(4) Set:     
 You are immune to Desecrator, Molten, and Plagued monster ground effects.
